SugarCRM | Various Locations; REMOTE | Fulltime

SugarCRM is hiring for a wide variety of positions, both technical and otherwise, in a number of locations, including remote. You can see all the open positions here: http://jobvite.com/m?3ZlTshwr

In particular, we're currently looking for a Senior Operations Engineer: http://jobvite.com/m?3UlTshwm . The listing says Cupertino, but we're willing to discuss remote for strong applicants.

I've been at Sugar for a nearly 3.5 years now and it's honestly the best job I've ever had. If you have any questions about working here, feel free to message me.
